src/config/types.ts.description: Added slash mechanics types: SlashPowerLevel enum (0-3), SlashPatternType enum (circle, zigzag, straight), state interfaces (SlashEnergyState, SlashPowerState, SlashPatternState), config interfaces, and event interfaces for energy/power/pattern changes.

src/managers/SlashEnergyManager.ts.description: SlashEnergyManager singleton managing slash energy: consumeEnergy(distance) depletes based on slash length, update() handles regeneration with configurable delay, getEffectiveness() returns damage/score multiplier based on current energy level

src/ui/HUD.ts.description: HUD class now includes energy bar with createEnergyBar(), updateEnergy(), and showEnergyBar() methods. Energy bar is positioned at bottom-left of screen and listens to 'slash-energy-changed' events.

src/entities/SlashTrail.ts.description: SlashTrail now has charge/power mechanics: startCharging() begins charge, updateCharging(deltaTime) updates power level (0-3) based on SLASH_POWER.chargeTimePerLevel (0.5s), stopCharging() returns accumulated power, resetPower() clears state. Visual charge indicator ring with color progression and EventBus events (slash-power-changed, slash-power-charged).

src/systems/SlashSystem.ts.description: Added pattern visual confirmation effects (createPatternConfirmationEffect, createCirclePatternEffect, createZigzagPatternEffect, createStraightPatternEffect, createPatternLabel, createSparkEffect) that are triggered from onSlashEnd() when a valid pattern is detected. Effects use SLASH_PATTERN_VISUAL constants for timing.

src/utils/helpers.ts.description: Pattern detection functions (detectZigzagPattern, detectStraightPattern, detectCirclePattern) were all implemented together in subtask-1-3. The detectSlashPattern orchestrator tries all patterns and returns the one with highest confidence. Pattern detection uses Douglas-Peucker simplification, angle calculations, and perpendicular distance metrics with configurable thresholds from SLASH_PATTERN constants.
